description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Finally, a massage app with avatars and online play! A perfect solution for long-distance massage buddies or anyone who's just dying for a soothing massage. We here at JForce Headquarters are experts on rumble technology, and we're pushing the limits. This means you can actually get the maximum vibration out of your controller! MASSAGERRIFFIC!!!
description.short: Finally, a massage app with avatars and online play! A perfect solution for long-distance massage buddies or anyone who's just dying for a soothing massage. We here at JForce Headquarters are experts on rumble technology, and we're pushing the limits. This means you can actually get the maximum vibration out of your controller! MASSAGERRIFFIC!!!
